title: Best of The Herd: 10/04/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/04/2019
description:
Colin points out how football looks almost effortless for Russell Wilson who never looks like he's feeling any pressure. He says Jared Goff is clearly not the problem with the Rams even though he is an easy target. Aaron Rodgers is becoming Johnny Depp and Colin explains why that's not a good thing. Plus, WWE legend Hulk Hogan comes in studio to talk with Colin about his impact on wrestling today and when he finally realized he was a super star.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
